channel.title: Need HELP with ATTACK OPTION, in wild and when your not in wild

item.title: Need HELP with ATTACK OPTION, in wild and when your not in wild
item.dc:creator: @Lil_Brudder Lil Brudder (-_-)
item.description:
@Lil_Brudder wrote:

Okay i have this code that makes the attack option come up if you are in the mage arena.

[code] if(absX >= 3091 && absX <= 3120 && absY >=3929 && absY <=3946)
{
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@red@Attack");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
IsInWilderness = true;
}
else
{
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@red@Attack");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
IsInWilderness = false;
}

}[/code]

BUT! i want to make it so the attack option goes away when you arn’t in the mage arena. How the heck do i do that. Tell me what to replace the second part after } else { with…please

Read full topic
item.source: Need HELP with ATTACK OPTION, in wild and when your not in wild
